>Showreel 2009-2010 (1)

01 May 2010



Finally got around to doing my awesome showreel. It's the first time I've done this but since I've been extremely busy of late, I thought I'd get around to putting all the workI've done in the last 6 months into a short video. Hope you like it!

The song is "Two Feet on the Ground" by the excellent Pronobozo. Just bought his latest album, Hackwave and you should too!
